text: - Hi.
I'm Webby.

And today, I'm counting down
some of my favorite monsters.

Starting my list at
number four is Ligeia.

While she may look like
a cute little girl,

Ligeia is actually
secretly terrifying.
Ooh, kind of like you.
Aw, thank you.

Number three on my
list of top monsters

is everyone's
favorite troglobite,

the Terrafirmians,
roly poly creatures
that live under the ground.
You know I'm on board.

But do they come
in peace or peril?
Ooh.

Up next, number two on my
countdown of top monsters

is everyone's favorite
magic megalodon,
Tiffany the Money Shark.
Wait, a shark made of money?
Why am I not doing this list?
You said you didn't want to.
You're right.
I don't.

And now for number one
on my top monster countdown

is those famous flying
females from Ithaquack,

the Harpies, part bird of
prey, part terrifying monster.
I mean, what's not to like?

Thanks for watching my
"DuckTales" monster countdown.

I hope you didn't suffer
from cuteness overload.

DEWEY: Webby, you just described
four horrifying monsters.
WEBBY: I know.

Can you believe we
get paid to do this?

DEWEY: Wait, you're
getting paid?
